req.name: image_uuid
req.p: ID of the log entry image to be deleted. The user of your Access Token must be the author of the log entry.

returns.p: A dictionary of the following structure:

ul.li: success - true, if all went well,

returns.p: Please note, that this will always be true! Nothing can go wrong as long as you pass your parameters in a right way (and if you don't, you will get an HTTP 400 response). If you have received an HTTP 200 response, then you may assume that all went well.
